explains: adj. 破旧的，破烂的；（人）衣着破旧的，衣衫褴褛的；（行为）卑鄙的，不公正的；（质量）低劣的

sentences.en: She wore shabby old jeans and a T-shirt.
sentences.cn: 她穿着一条破旧的牛仔裤和一件T恤衫。

sentences.en: The general divided his time between his shabby offices and his home in Hampstead.
sentences.cn: 将军的时间一部分在他那破旧的办公室里度过，另一部分在他汉普斯特德的家度过。

sentences.en: His clothes were old and shabby.
